amendment.description: Amendment expands the entities eligible to receive grants and contracts for clinical practices and technology innovation to include minority institutions of higher education (such as Historically Black Colleges and Universities, and Hispanic institutions).
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 6 printed in the Congressional Record. to include minority institutions of higher education (such as Historically Black Colleges and Universities, and Hispanic institutions) as eligible entities for grants and contracts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davis (IL) amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
